entry.title: Evangaline Buckley Begins
entry.summary:
Author: Not_Ren_42

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 53,642Chapters: 16/24Kudos: 282

Summary: Evangaline Buckley has been alone for most of her life. She was unwanted by her parents and left by her sister when she had the first chance. For her most formative years, she had to go to extreme lengths just to get attention from those meant to care for her, failing more often than not.After finding out the truth about her creation, Evie decides that she has to do something â€“ anything. She goes through even more pain and heartbreak before finding herself where she was always meant to end up. -+- This is both a prologue and season 1 rewrite.New chapter every Friday :)

entry.title: but if you're the one for me, then i'll be your hero
entry.summary:
Author: folklorestars

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 52,118Chapters: 9/10Kudos: 92

Summary: â€œLet me guess,â€ Eddie started, smiling faker than ever. â€œYou thought I'd be dying to ride in a car with Evan Buckley as he sings to one of his big hits. A fan's dream come true!â€ Eddie grinned ear to ear as cheesy as possible. Buck smiled awkwardly, so Eddie continued, â€œThere's just one problem.â€ â€œWhich is?â€ â€œI'm not your fan.â€ There was that wounded puppy look again. The sad eyes bigger and bluer than ever, mouth drooping down almost into a pout. â€œYou don't... You don't like my music?â€ â€œNo, I like your music. And I think youâ€™re talented. I'm just not crazy about you like everyone else seems to be,â€ Eddie clarified. Or; the Buddie Starstruck AU

entry.title: slip of the tongue
entry.summary:
Author: brewrosemilk

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,279Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 120

Summary: â€œI, uhâ€¦ I felt a little bad, though, right, I meanâ€”they just wanted a day they could never forget,â€ Buck muses, thenâ€”and Eddie hums. â€œGuess youâ€™re right,â€ he agrees. â€œThen again, if you need pyrotechnics to remember your wedding maybe youâ€™re marrying the wrong person,â€ he goes on, then, his body and mouth relaxing along with his brain, the words flowing without permission. â€œKnow you like the grand gestures, but if you wanna risk our guests lives when itâ€™s our turn, Iâ€™m afraid thatâ€™s something Iâ€™m gonna have to veto, bud,â€ he sighs. The thing isâ€¦ it takes a second for his brain to catch upâ€”heâ€™s so relaxed, so at home, so at peaceâ€¦ in fact, the only thing that cues him into the fact that heâ€™s said anything at all out of the ordinary is the significant silence coming from his left. Andâ€¦ swallowing, Eddie brings the bottle of beer down from his temple, his eyes slipping open as his brain rewinds the last few seconds. Shit.

entry.title: Just one more breath
entry.summary:
Author: CarpeDiem911

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 90,347Chapters: 28/28Kudos: 352

Summary: The hysterical laughter stole every coherent thought from Buck and crawled into his bones; his heart thudded and he stared at the doll in disbelief. Then, as suddenly as it had started, the laughter stopped; leaving an eerie silence. Buck stood frozen, his thoughts like thick mud, staring at that stupid doll. He completely missed the huge hole in the wall above the tub. He missed the shadow standing there, watching him from behind the hole with cold eyes and a malicious smile.

entry.title: The Family We Chose
entry.summary:
Author: Pnk_strawberry1

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,286Chapters: 10/18Kudos: 226

Summary: Evan Buckley was truly fucked. One week after leaving the only home heâ€™d ever knownâ€”his parentsâ€™ houseâ€”Ground Zero hit, and the world went to hell. Eight months later, heâ€™s still searching for his sister Maddie in Los Angeles, armed only with a tear-stained note: â€œIâ€™m leaving Doug. Iâ€™m going to Los Angeles.â€ When Buck finally tracks her to Safe Zone 118, he realizes that maybe having a familyâ€”and surviving alongside people who actually careâ€”isnâ€™t so bad. At 118, firefighter Eddie Diaz, a single dad, turned his fire station into a refuge with his team when Ground Zero struck. Just trying to keep his kids safe, heâ€™s thrown for a loop when a stranger shows up claiming to be Maddieâ€™s brother. Buck is skilled, prepared, and oddly magneticâ€”forcing Eddie to question everything he thought he knew about survival, trust, and maybe evenâ€¦ something more.

entry.title: don't want to let you go (til you see the light)
entry.summary:
Author: Elgney

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,128Chapters: 1/3Kudos: 135

Summary: "Hey, sorry about that, I was justâ€”Eddie?â€ Eddieâ€™s head shot up at the sight of Buck, frozen halfway towards his seat. â€œBuck?â€ Buck let out an awkward chuckle and glanced around. â€œThere must be a mix-up, Iâ€™ll go askâ€”â€ â€œNo!â€ Eddie practically yelled the word, and then he winced at the desperation in his own voice. Belatedly, he realized it was possible that people who were interested in men were supposed to be sitting there. But Buck was watching him with wide eyes, still paused leaning on his chair, so Eddie added, â€œI could use a six-minute break. You know, from finding out how many siblings every woman in this bar has.â€ Buckâ€™s eyes glinted in the dim bar lighting. He finally took the seat and asked, â€œoh, so you donâ€™t care about how many siblings I have?â€ â€”â€” Eddie and Buck finally go on a date. It just takes them three times to realize it.

entry.title: You Gave Me All That Time
entry.summary:
Author: This_Witch_Writes

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 82,614Chapters: 17/20Kudos: 36

Summary: Conversations that didnâ€™t happen in hospitals and at kitchen tables that should have and changed things just enough or: Buck thought he could track his life through different peopleâ€™s kitchens. Eddie was starting to associate the Buckley siblings with hospitals. Maddie just wanted to understand her brotherâ€™s new life and have the ground stop moving from under her. Maddie and Eddie bond over trying to protect their families. Buck and Eddie try to figure out what they need from each other. Meanwhile the 118 really does seem to have the worst luck in the city. Are they really jinxed or is there something else going on? A canon divergences starting in season 3 and growing increasingly divergent. Title from â€˜Mess in Mineâ€™ by Vance Joy (fic anthem a little bit)
